heading: Event 1 Fontainebleau
leadText: Fontainebleau Castle is a magnificent French royal residence blending Renaissance and classical architecture, surrounded by lush forests.

heading: Event 2 Open Book
leadText: Reading a book is a journey into new worlds, ideas, and perspectives, all from the comfort of your imagination.

heading: Event 3 Paris Bridge
